abstract: The activist shareholder Carl C. Icahn stepped up his takeover battle with Lions Gate Entertainment on Wednesday after his hostile bid was rejected, saying its board had failed to provide value to its shareholders
snippet: The activist shareholder Carl C. Icahn stepped up his takeover battle with Lions Gate Entertainment on Wednesday after his hostile bid was rejected, saying its board had failed to provide value to its shareholders
lead_paragraph: 3:32 p.m. | Updated with Lions Gate comment The activist shareholder Carl C. Icahn stepped up his takeover battle with Lions Gate Entertainment on Wednesday after his hostile bid was rejected, saying its board had failed to provide value to its shareholders, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Icahn Says Lions Gate Has Failed Shareholders
